channel.title: Kubeday on Joshua Bezaleel Abednego
channel.description: Recent content in Kubeday on Joshua Bezaleel Abednego

item.title: KubeDay Australia 2024
item.description: DevOps and operations, SRE, platform Cindy Sridharan - Everyone is not Ops [link] Matt Klein - Human Scalability of DevOps [link] Alex Hidalgo, Andrew Clay Shafer - Hell is Other Platforms [link] Tanya Reilly - Being Glue [link] Lorin Hochstein - Making Operational Work More Visible [link] Infrastructure engineering Will Larson - How to Invest in Technical Infrastructure [link] Will Larson - Product Management in Infrastructure Engineering [link] Platform engineering Charity Majors - Perils, Pitfals, and Pratfalls of Platform Engineering [link] Camille Fournier - Product for Internal Platforms [link] Galo Navaro - How to Build a PaaS for 1500 Engineers [link] Developer experience, developer productivity, and developer tools Peter Seibel - Let A 1000 Flowers Bloom.
